item.title: Roman Senninger
item.description: I am an Associate Professor of Political Science at Aarhus University. My research focuses on political elites and political institutions in domestic and European Union politics. Methodologically, I have a strong interest in (quasi-) experiments, computational text analysis, and spatial and geographic data analysis. Email: rsenninger@ps.au.dk Twitter: @r_senninger

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Fall 2022 The Role of Space and Geography in Politics: Theory, Method, and Application Spring 2022 Policy Evaluation
